brainly_data.question: · gangsterism· the eighteenth amendment· bootleggers· speakeasies all of these terms are associated with what era in american history?
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: · gangsterism· the eighteenth amendment· bootleggers· speakeasies all of these terms are associated with what era in american history?
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: The Prohibition Era. This was when the U.S. tried (and failed) to make the entire country dry (not sell alcoholic beverages).
